args: Looks like Melody is running late.\nI wonder what happened?
Melody, what happened to you?!\nYou're covered in scrapes and bruises!
Oh, I just fell down some stairs. No big.\nThe terrible thing is that YOU had to wait!
Uh, are you sure you're all right?\nWe can postpone the trip ifâ€”
I'M FINE! Er, I mean, I'm fine.\nNow let's get this rolling, master!
A broach like the one you chose\nwill go nicely with any outfit!
I appreciate your help, Melody. I never\nwould have selected this on my own.
Oh, I didn't do all that much...
Well, the day is still fairly young.\nAny idea what we could do now?
Oh! W-well, if you don't mind too terribly,\nmaybe we could go have some tea?
Tea? Sure, why not. I guess it's been\na while since I relaxed in a cafe.
(Now, I put my super awesome dateâ€”\nI mean, DAYâ€”plan into play!)
(If I was ever excited about this, it feels\nlike forever ago. I really underestimated\nmy own ability to screw things up...)
(The nice little cafe I was thinking of\nhas shut down, so that was a bust....)
(That lovely art exhibit closed early,\nso we ended up going to a horror\nexhibit all about fiends...)
(And then when we try to go for a nice\nstroll, I somehow get us lost IN THE TOWN\nSQUARE! How is that even POSSIBLE?)
I'm so sorry, master! I didn't mean for\nyou to navigate us out of that mess!
Oh, it's no big deal. It's actually kind of\nfunny we managed to get lost in the\nmiddle of a small town.
Still, I bet you're tired from all that\nwalking around. Let's get off our feet\nfor a bit on that bench over there.
(Gosh darn it. Instead of giving him a\nnice relaxing day, I ended up making\nhim tired...)
(But if I get all depressed, I won't\nbe able to thank him properly.)
(Plus, the next item on my plan of attack\nis the one I REALLY care about!\nOkay, Melody. You can do this!)
A-actually, master, I have a\npresent for you.
Yes! Er, what with it being\nValentine's and all...
I wanted to give you something to show\nhow much I appreciate all that you do,\nso I made you this sweater.
That's amazing, Melody. Do you mind\nif I open it here?
Of course! I really think you're going to\nlove the picture I stitched on the front.
Thank you! Okay, let's see...\nHuh? This is...
Actually, it's supposed to be you\nstanding in front of the Halidom?
(Oh no! It doesn't look a thing like\nI wanted it to!)
(I'm pretty sure I saw more inviting work\nat the horror exhibit earlier!)
(This is what you get for staying up\nall night sewing, you dorkus!)
So it's me and the Halidom. I see.\nBoy, the castle sure is...red.

Well, it's...uh...an impressionistic design! 
Yes, that's it. See, I wanted to represent
your red-hot passion for the new kingdom
that you're trying to create!
Well, it certainly has Melody written all\nover it. Or sewn, I suppose. Regardless,\nit's great. Thank you.
No, please! You don't have to force\nyourself to wear it or anything!
(Ugh, things are going downhill fast.\nAnd this was supposed to be the EASY\npart of my plan!)
(At this rate, he'll never understand\nhow much I appreciate him!)
(Well, desperate times call for Melody\nmeasures. It's time for my patented\nï¼‚nap on lapï¼‚ gambit!)
(It has an extraordinarily relaxing effect\nthat I KNOW he's gonna love!)
Whew, what a day, huh? It's nice to\nhave a chance to catch my breath\nonce in a while like this.
I-it sure is!\nIt kind of makes you sleepy, right?

Well, I can't say I'm sleepy myself, but I
suppose I can understand someone feeling
that way. The sunlight today is incredibly
inviting.
It IS, isn't it?! And in that case, let's stay\nhere and warm ourselves for a bit!\nYes! Right here! Nice and toasty!
Uh, okay? You seem weirdly excited\nabout this, but I'm happy to stay if\nthat's what you want.

(He's suspicious, but this is good!
Once he gets tired from lounging in the
sunlight, I'll offer my lap for a nap
and then BOOM! Perfection.)
(Now, master! Get tired!\nYou're getting veeeery sleepy...)
Heh. Now I understand why you asked\nif I was tiredâ€”it's because you were!
(Wait, is he laughing at me?! Oh,\nMelody, you big dummy! How could you\nfall asleep in the middle of the plan?!)
(This day has been one humiliating loss\nafter another, and all I have left are the\nhomemade treats.)
(At least I know this one can't go wrong\nsince Philia and Cibella helped out.)
(They're baked with love from the three\nof us, so they HAVE to be good!)
(There's no better way to say thank you\nthan with something baked, after all.)
Oh no! The box of cupcakes!
No! It's grabbing the box!\nDon't even think about it, bird!
Noooo! Stop! Don't leave with thaaaat!
*pant* The bird went this way I think...
I've gotta get those cupcakes back!
That's the only thing I have left for my\nmaster that I didn't totally screw up!
